section.title: Proofing tools for the Kven language
section.p: The Kven proofing tools are under development, and the linguistic quality is varying. Use the tools critically, and update often!

section.title: Proofing tools for other languages
section.p: The Divvun group has a separate web site for proofing tools for non-Sámi languages, developed in cooperation with several organisations. Visit divvun.org for more information and to download the proofing tools.
